Name: Aliens Love Beefs
About the game: Aliens are hungry and they would LOVE to bite some tasty Beef. Abduct the Beefs on each planet avoiding missiles, explosions and lasers. Casual indie Virtual Reality game using cool spherical gravity game mechanics. Specially designed just for VR environment. DESIGNED FOR HTC VIVE, OCULUS RIFT SUPPORT COMING SOON! Use your hand to control the alien UFO and beam up the beefs before the time runs out. Easy to learn and play, suitable for everyone. Leaderboards per episode and per game total. SETTINGS MENU: Adjust player height and if you prefer Left/Right handed game play! Current episodes (6 levels on each): - Episode 1 - Beef Regular - Episode 2 - Beef Evolution - Episode 3 - Beef in Chili Sauce - Episode 4 - Beef BBQ - More coming on future updates (included) FREE extra levels and new specially themed episodes coming on next updates! Blob Lab is a small single person game studio. Please support my work! Any feedback would also be appreciated! Thanks!
